title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 5 papers from the Super Bowl of Economics
items.description: Planet Money went to the annual meeting of the American Economics Association, and we saw some fascinating papers presented there.

items.description: A period drama, a Supreme Court case and voice our film critic hadn't heard in decades.

items.title: Russian hits Ukraine energy sites in 'most powerful blow' so far this year
items.description: The attack - which reportedly consisted of more than 70 missiles and 450 drones - comes after a so-called "energy truce" expired at the weekend.

items.title: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
items.description: The Paris prosecutor says its cyber-crime unit is conducting a search of X's offices.

items.title: Fifa president 'infantile' for wanting to lift Russia ban, Ukraine minister says
items.description: Ukraine's sports minister calls Fifa president Gianni Infantino "irresponsible" and "infantile" for saying it will look at lifting a ban on Russia.

items.title: Rape trial begins for son of Norway's crown princess in tense moment for royal family
items.description: Marius Borg Høiby is accused of 38 charges including four counts of rape in one of the biggest cases in Norway for years.

items.title: Don Lemon says he offered to turn himself in but agents were sent for him
items.description: Don Lemon says he offered to turn himself in to face charges over his coverage of a protest at a church but federal agents were sent for him anyway.

items.title: Boy swims 2.5 miles to save family swept out to sea: "Superhuman"
items.description: "The waves are massive and I have no life jacket on. … I just kept thinking 'just keep swimming, just keep swimming,'" Austin Appelbee said.

items.title: Air India grounds Boeing jet after pilot flags possible fuel control switch defect
items.description: The grounding comes amid an investigation into a crash last year involving an aircraft of the same model.
